item.description:
You have all heard the forecast for Wednesday and its for SNOOOWWWWWW!!!! Its supposed to stay cold right through the weekend too and into next week.

I'm going to play hooky at Great Brook on Friday to celebrate.

Be inside the barn by the big door and READY TO SKI by 10:30 AM. Great Brook rents all kinds of gear rental fee $13, trail passes are $12, and it is CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY * CASH ONLY. They also sell a season pass for $60, I'm going to get mine. Bring a picnic lunch if you like, I am going to.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing the Santa hat......

group.name: The Boston Cross-Country Skiing and Snowshoe Meetup Group

item.name: Great Brook Friday Hooky
